headline: Expand Energy Corporation (EXE): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Expand Energy Corporation on X.com by @MoneyShow. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on EXE. Expand Energy Corporation’s share was trading at $ 106.05 as of February 25th. EXE’s trailing and forward P/E were 25.28 and 10.04 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
